00075 int mdt_init_idmap(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00076 {
00077         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
00078         struct mdt_export_data *med = mdt_req2med(req);
00079         struct obd_export *exp = req->rq_export;
00080         char *client = libcfs_nid2str(req->rq_peer.nid);
00081         int rc = 0;
00082         ENTRY;
00083 
00084         if (exp_connect_rmtclient(exp)) {
00085                 mutex_lock(&med->med_idmap_mutex);
00086                 if (!med->med_idmap)
00087                         med->med_idmap = lustre_idmap_init();
00088                 mutex_unlock(&med->med_idmap_mutex);
00089 
00090                 if (IS_ERR(med->med_idmap)) {
00091                         long err = PTR_ERR(med->med_idmap);
00092 
00093                         med->med_idmap = NULL;
00094                         CERROR("%s: client %s -> target %s "
00095                                "failed to init idmap [%ld]!\n",
00096                                tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), client,
00097                                tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), err);
00098                         RETURN(err);
00099                 } else if (!med->med_idmap) {
00100                         CERROR("%s: client %s -> target %s "
00101                                "failed to init(2) idmap!\n",
00102                                tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), client,
00103                                tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt));
00104                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00105                 }
00106 
00107                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "%s: client %s -> target %s is remote.\n",
00108                         tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), client,
00109                         tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt));
00110                 /* NB, MDS_CONNECT establish root idmap too! */
00111                 rc = mdt_handle_idmap(tsi);
00112         }
00113         RETURN(rc);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void mdt_cleanup_idmap(struct mdt_export_data *med)
00117 {
00118         mutex_lock(&med->med_idmap_mutex);
00119         if (med->med_idmap != NULL) {
00120                 lustre_idmap_fini(med->med_idmap);
00121                 med->med_idmap = NULL;
00122         }
00123         mutex_unlock(&med->med_idmap_mutex);
00124 }
00125 
00126 static inline void mdt_revoke_export_locks(struct obd_export *exp)
00127 {
00128         /* don't revoke locks during recovery */
00129         if (exp->exp_obd->obd_recovering)
00130                 return;
00131 
00132         ldlm_revoke_export_locks(exp);
00133 }
00134 
00135 int mdt_handle_idmap(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00136 {
00137         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
00138         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mdt_exp2dev(req->rq_export);
00139         struct mdt_export_data *med;
00140         struct ptlrpc_user_desc *pud = req->rq_user_desc;
00141         struct md_identity *identity;
00142         __u32 opc;
00143         int rc = 0;
00144         ENTRY;
00145 
00146         if (!req->rq_export)
00147                 RETURN(0);
00148 
00149         med = mdt_req2med(req);
00150         if (!exp_connect_rmtclient(req->rq_export))
00151                 RETURN(0);
00152 
00153         opc = lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg);
00154         /* Bypass other opc */
00155         if ((opc != SEC_CTX_INIT) && (opc != SEC_CTX_INIT_CONT) &&
00156             (opc != SEC_CTX_FINI) && (opc != MDS_CONNECT))
00157                 RETURN(0);
00158 
00159         LASSERT(med->med_idmap);
00160 
00161         if (unlikely(!pud)) {
00162                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "remote client must run with rq_user_desc "
00163                        "present\n");
00164                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00165         }
00166 
00167         if (!uid_valid(make_kuid(&init_user_ns, req->rq_auth_mapped_uid))) {
00168                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "invalid authorized mapped uid, please check "
00169                        "/etc/lustre/idmap.conf!\n");
00170                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00171         }
00172 
00173         if (is_identity_get_disabled(mdt->mdt_identity_cache)) {
00174                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "remote client must run with identity_get "
00175                        "enabled!\n");
00176                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00177         }
00178 
00179         identity = mdt_identity_get(mdt->mdt_identity_cache,
00180                                     req->rq_auth_mapped_uid);
00181         if (IS_ERR(identity)) {
00182                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "can't get mdt identity(%u), no mapping added\n",
00183                        req->rq_auth_mapped_uid);
00184                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00185         }
00186 
00187         switch (opc) {
00188                 case SEC_CTX_INIT:
00189                 case SEC_CTX_INIT_CONT:
00190                 case MDS_CONNECT:
00191                         rc = lustre_idmap_add(med->med_idmap,
00192                                               pud->pud_uid, identity->mi_uid,
00193                                               pud->pud_gid, identity->mi_gid);
00194                         break;
00195                 case SEC_CTX_FINI:
00196                         rc = lustre_idmap_del(med->med_idmap,
00197                                               pud->pud_uid, identity->mi_uid,
00198                                               pud->pud_gid, identity->mi_gid);
00199                         break;
00200         }
00201 
00202         mdt_identity_put(mdt->mdt_identity_cache, identity);
00203 
00204         if (rc)
00205                 RETURN(rc);
00206 
00207         switch (opc) {
00208                 case SEC_CTX_INIT:
00209                 case SEC_CTX_INIT_CONT:
00210                 case SEC_CTX_FINI:
00211                         mdt_revoke_export_locks(req->rq_export);
00212                         break;
00213         }
00214 
00215         RETURN(0);
00216 }
00217 
00218 int ptlrpc_user_desc_do_idmap(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00219                               struct ptlrpc_user_desc *pud)
00220 {
00221         struct mdt_export_data    *med = mdt_req2med(req);
00222         struct lustre_idmap_table *idmap = med->med_idmap;
00223         uid_t uid, fsuid;
00224         gid_t gid, fsgid;
00225 
00226         /* Only remote client need desc_to_idmap. */
00227         if (!exp_connect_rmtclient(req->rq_export))
00228                 return 0;
00229 
00230         uid = lustre_idmap_lookup_uid(NULL, idmap, 0, pud->pud_uid);
00231         if (uid == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
00232                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "no mapping for uid %u\n", pud->pud_uid);
00233                 return -EACCES;
00234         }
00235 
00236         if (pud->pud_uid == pud->pud_fsuid) {
00237                 fsuid = uid;
00238         } else {
00239                 fsuid = lustre_idmap_lookup_uid(NULL, idmap, 0, pud->pud_fsuid);
00240                 if (fsuid == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
00241                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "no mapping for fsuid %u\n",
00242                                pud->pud_fsuid);
00243                         return -EACCES;
00244                 }
00245         }
00246 
00247         gid = lustre_idmap_lookup_gid(NULL, idmap, 0, pud->pud_gid);
00248         if (gid == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
00249                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "no mapping for gid %u\n", pud->pud_gid);
00250                 return -EACCES;
00251         }
00252 
00253         if (pud->pud_gid == pud->pud_fsgid) {
00254                 fsgid = gid;
00255         } else {
00256                 fsgid = lustre_idmap_lookup_gid(NULL, idmap, 0, pud->pud_fsgid);
00257                 if (fsgid == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
00258                         CDEBUG(D_SEC, "no mapping for fsgid %u\n",
00259                                pud->pud_fsgid);
00260                         return -EACCES;
00261                 }
00262         }
00263 
00264         pud->pud_uid = uid;
00265         pud->pud_gid = gid;
00266         pud->pud_fsuid = fsuid;
00267         pud->pud_fsgid = fsgid;
00268 
00269         return 0;
00270 }
00271 
00272 /*
00273  * Reverse mapping
00274  */
00275 void mdt_body_reverse_idmap(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_body *body)
00276 {
00277         struct ptlrpc_request     *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00278         struct lu_ucred           *uc = mdt_ucred(info);
00279         struct mdt_export_data    *med = mdt_req2med(req);
00280         struct lustre_idmap_table *idmap = med->med_idmap;
00281 
00282         if (!exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp))
00283                 return;
00284 
00285         if (body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLUID) {
00286                 uid_t uid;
00287 
00288                 uid = lustre_idmap_lookup_uid(uc, idmap, 1, body->mbo_uid);
00289 
00290                 if (uid == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
00291                         uid = NOBODY_UID;
00292                         if (body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLMODE)
00293                                 body->mbo_mode = (body->mbo_mode & ~S_IRWXU) |
00294                                              ((body->mbo_mode & S_IRWXO) << 6);
00295                 }
00296 
00297                 body->mbo_uid = uid;
00298         }
00299 
00300         if (body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLGID) {
00301                 gid_t gid;
00302 
00303                 gid = lustre_idmap_lookup_gid(uc, idmap, 1, body->mbo_gid);
00304 
00305                 if (gid == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
00306                         gid = NOBODY_GID;
00307                         if (body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLMODE)
00308                                 body->mbo_mode = (body->mbo_mode & ~S_IRWXG) |
00309                                              ((body->mbo_mode & S_IRWXO) << 3);
00310                 }
00311 
00312                 body->mbo_gid = gid;
00313         }
00314 }
00315 
00316 /* Do not ignore root_squash for non-setattr case. */
00317 int mdt_fix_attr_ucred(struct mdt_thread_info *info, __u32 op)
00318 {
00319         struct ptlrpc_request     *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00320         struct lu_ucred           *uc = mdt_ucred_check(info);
00321         struct lu_attr            *attr = &info->mti_attr.ma_attr;
00322         struct mdt_export_data    *med = mdt_req2med(req);
00323         struct lustre_idmap_table *idmap = med->med_idmap;
00324 
00325         if (uc == NULL)
00326                 return -EINVAL;
00327 
00328         if (op != REINT_SETATTR) {
00329                 if ((attr->la_valid & LA_UID) && (attr->la_uid != -1))
00330                         attr->la_uid = uc->uc_fsuid;
00331                 /* for S_ISGID, inherit gid from his parent, such work will be
00332                  * done in cmm/mdd layer, here set all cases as uc->uc_fsgid. */
00333                 if ((attr->la_valid & LA_GID) && (attr->la_gid != -1))
00334                         attr->la_gid = uc->uc_fsgid;
00335         } else if (exp_connect_rmtclient(info->mti_exp)) {
00336                 /* NB: -1 case will be handled by mdt_fix_attr() later. */
00337                 if ((attr->la_valid & LA_UID) && (attr->la_uid != -1)) {
00338                         uid_t uid = lustre_idmap_lookup_uid(uc, idmap, 0,
00339                                                             attr->la_uid);
00340 
00341                         if (uid == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
00342                                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "Deny chown to uid %u\n",
00343                                        attr->la_uid);
00344                                 return -EPERM;
00345                         }
00346 
00347                         attr->la_uid = uid;
00348                 }
00349                 if ((attr->la_valid & LA_GID) && (attr->la_gid != -1)) {
00350                         gid_t gid = lustre_idmap_lookup_gid(uc, idmap, 0,
00351                                                             attr->la_gid);
00352 
00353                         if (gid == CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND) {
00354                                 CDEBUG(D_SEC, "Deny chown to gid %u\n",
00355                                        attr->la_gid);
00356                                 return -EPERM;
00357                         }
00358 
00359                         attr->la_gid = gid;
00360                 }
00361         }
00362 
00363         return 0;
00364 }
